task.title: Searching a Hotel on the Booking.com Application
task.shortdesc: To search a hotel on the Booking.com Application:

context.p: Travellers can search different stays like hotels, or homestays, or apartments on the Booking.com application.

step.cmd: On the Booking.com application screen, click on the Stays tab. The details of the Stays tab display.
Enter a destination or search a destination in the Enter your destination field.
Click the Calendar icon to select the dates. The Select dates screen displays.

ol.li: On the Select dates screen, click the Calendar tab
On the Calendar tab, scroll up and down to select a date and year.
At the bottom of the Calendar tab, click Exact dates to book the hotel on exact dates.
Click any plus minus 1 day, 2 days, 3 days, and so on options to book the hotel either in next 2 or 3 days as per preference.
On the Select dates screen, click the I'm Flexible tab.
Under the How long do you want to stay? option , select A weekend, A week, and so on.
Under the When do yo want to go? option, scroll to the left and select any 3 months from the list.
Click the Select dates button at the bottom of the screen. The dates are selected for the stays.

step.cmd: Click the People icon to select a room. The Select rooms and guests screen displays.
Click the + or - icons in the Number box to select more or less Rooms.
Click the + and - icons in the Number box to select more or less Adults.
Click the + and - icons in the Number box to select more or less Children.
Click the slider to enable the Travelling with pets? option.
Click the Apply button to apply the selected options for Rooms, Adults, Children, and Pets.The screen is navigated to the Booking.com homepage
Click the Search button. The list of hotels is available according to the selected criteria.

taskbody.result: The list of hotels is available as per the requirement.
